message.body: no problem! i'm happy i could potentially recruit someone, haha.
Hehe :) do you study sign language at all?
not so much, i've always wanted to, though! i know a couple signs because i used to work in a nursery and we used some signs with the littles.
Ooh that's cool! I ve heard that parents sometimes teach babies sign language b4 a spoken language
yeah, it was really helpful for the ones who were reluctant to start talking... what inspired you to start learning?
I lead a girls Bible study and 1 of the girls speaks sign(shes not deaf tho) and also i few weeks back there was a deaf lady at my church and i realized i
could nt talk with her haha
oh wow! that's really neat. i hope you can keep working on it this semester!
Yeah! Definately! Really excited to find something that ll work :)
